story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_:
If you could help me detain the Team Flare
traitors, I would be very grateful, Diantha.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_0400_: Of course! You can count on my help.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_0700_: Take me, too! I wanna help!
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_0800_: No way! This is a dangerous investigation.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1000_: Why can’t I be your partner?
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1100_: Look, that’s not what I mean...
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1200_: If Emma alone isn’t enough, I’ll come, too.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1300_:
Helping out with the investigation is a better use
of my time than playing around.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1400_:
Looker, why don’t we believe in their shine
of justice?
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1500_: If anything happens, I’ll protect them.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1700_:
I suppose if you say so, Diantha. Let’s take them
both with us.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_1900_:
Well then, before we leave, we have to tell
the others!
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2000_: You’re going to investigate Team Flare?!
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2200_: No, you should all enjoy the festival to the fullest!
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2400_: But, if something happens while we’re away...
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2500_: I might have to ask for your help.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2700_:
Well then, Professor Sycamore. I’ll leave the rest
to you.
story_teamflare_02_02000/2401_1001_2800_: Got it! Please be careful, you two!
